=====================================
 
### Government Solicitation Announcement: Architectural Consultant Services (SOA)

#### Solicitation Number: MLARCH24
#### Publication Date: January 25, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: March 5, 2024 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting proposals from qualified consulting firms to establish a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for architectural consultant services. The SOA will provide services on an "as and when required" basis for the Montreal garrison and satellite sites in Quebec.

**Scope of Work:**
The SOA will cover a range of professional engineering and architectural services, including:

* General architectural and engineering services at all applicable phases
* Pre-conceptual, sketch, final design, tender, construction, and post-construction phases

**Duration and Value:**
The SOA will be for a one-year period, with a maximum estimated value of $1,100,000.00. The SOA may be extended for up to two additional one-year periods, with a maximum total value of $3,300,000.00.

**Security Requirements:**
The selected contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC).

**Proposal Requirements:**
Prospective proponents are invited to submit abbreviated proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the tender closing date.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria established in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Contact:**
For further information and to obtain bid documents, please visit [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com).

** Buyer's Requirements:**

* Senior Architect
* Intermediate Architect
* Senior Structural Engineer
* Intermediate Structural Engineer
* Senior Mechanical Engineer
* Intermediate Mechanical Engineer
* Senior Electrical Engineer
* Intermediate Electrical Engineer
* Senior Civil Engineer
* Intermediate Civil Engineer
* Senior Energy Engineer
* Intermediate Energy Engineer
* Senior Technical Support
* Intermediate Technical Support
* Total Classification Rate

**Total Value of SOA:**

* Expected total value of the SOA is approximately $1,100,000.00
* The estimated cost for each call-up under the SOA will range between $20,000 and $80,000.00
* The maximum value for a call-up under the SOA is $100,000.00
